text: Letter dated 21 June 2012 from the President of the SecurityÂ Council addressed to the Secretary-General

I have the honour to inform you that your letter dated 18 June 2012 (S/2012/469) concerning your intention to establish a small Office of the Special Adviser to the Secretary-General on Yemen for an initial period of 12 months has been brought to the attention of the members of the Security Council. They take note of the intention expressed in your letter.

(Signed) Li Baodong 
President of the Security Council
